snippet: Top assistants, not proven head coaches, seem to be the focus in the search for Joe Paterno’s replacement, which has been going on for more than eight weeks.
abstract: Analysis; top football assistants, not proven head coaches, seem to be the focus of Penn State's search to replace Joe Paterno.
lead_paragraph: Top assistants, not proven head coaches, seem to be the focus in the search for Joe Paterno’s replacement, which has been going on for more than eight weeks.

headline.seo: Penn State Coaching Search’s Focus Seems to Be Assistants
headline.main: Lowered Sights in Penn State Search
headline.print_headline: Lowered Sights In Penn State Search
